titles.title: Individual Income Tax Rate Reduction Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce individual income tax rates and increase the standard deduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/8/2001--Introduced. Individual Income Tax Rate Reduction Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish new, lower tax rates for individuals. Increases the standard deduction and provides that such deduction on a joint return shall be twice the amount of a single return.
